title: help
body: need to a proper bulid for this champ and what items to use for him help me out{{champion:5}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}}

replies.body: Try 1-2 damage items first ({{item:3153}} first then maybe one of {{item:3071}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3155}} {{item:3078}} ) then some defensive items (some combination of {{item:3143}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3068}} depending on what resistances you need). Also upgrade boots to {{item:3111}} or {{item:3047}} sometime after your first or second big item. You might also want another damage item as your final item if you didn't get one earlier and already feel tanky enough.
